Label.name: Company Name
Label.searchInput: Search by name, city, VAT id, Tax id, registration number, DUNS number, or Global Location Number

Heading.address: Please add your company addresses here.
Heading.accessApproval: Please approve or reject user access request.
Heading.BankAccount: Please enter your bank account details.
Heading.contact: Please add your company contact persons here.
Heading.visibility: Please set preferences for your public profile.

Confirmation.cancel: Do you really want to cancel?

Messages.pageHelpText: On this page you provide the data for the registration of your company. If you do not have a VAT Identification Number, please fill in one of the fields marked with **.
Messages.failedCreatingExistingSupplier: Data saving failed: a company with the same Company Name already exists
Messages.failedCreatingUserSupplier: Supplier creation failed: you are already associated to a supplier.
Messages.identifierRequired: ** Please provide your VAT Registration Number. If you do not have one, then provide your Global Location Number, D-U-N-S number or OVT number.
Messages.required: ** Please provide your VAT Registration Number. If you do not have one, then provide your Global Location Number, D-U-N-S number, OVT number or IBAN.
Messages.noVatId: My Company does not have a VAT Identification Number.
Messages.clickCheckBox: Please provide your VAT Identification Number.
Messages.accessInformation1: Here you can request access to company {name}. You should request access only if you are an employee of this company.
Messages.accessInformation2: Please provide a valid business justification for your access.
Messages.accessInformation3: Your request will be forwarded to the administrator managing the company's profile.
Messages.accessInformation4: Once the administrator approves your access request, you will receive an email notification to your registered email address.
Messages.information1: Please provide information that helps us to uniquely identify your company and allows us to add it to our trading partner directory.
Messages.information2: After providing this information you are ready to login.

companyRegisterNumber.text: Companies are usually registered officially into a commercial register or trading register. They differ by country, for example:
companyRegisterNumber.de: For Germany, it refers to the Commercial Register Number. E.g. Dortmund HRB 1234
companyRegisterNumber.fi: For Finland, it refers to the Business ID. E.g. 1629284-5
companyRegisterNumber.se: For Sweden, it refers to the Organization Number. E.g. 556691-8065
companyRegisterNumber.us: For the US, it refers to the Employer Identification Number. E.g. 10-5434567
companyRegisterNumber.ch: For Switzerland, it refers to the Enterprise Identification Number. E.g. CHE-105.806.117
companyRegisterNumber.helpText: Commercial register number of the company you registering.

cityOfRegistration.helpText: The city where the company you are registering has its headquarters.

countryOfRegistration.helpText: The country in which the company you are registering has its headquarters.

Error.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.

AccessRequest.head: You have requested access to the company {name}.
AccessRequest.text: Please reach out to our support at +49 231 3967 350 or customerservice.de@opuscapita.com for further information.

Confirmation.approve: Are you sure you want to approve user?
Confirmation.reject: Are you sure you want to reject user?

Confirmation.delete: Do you really want to delete this address?
Do you really want to delete this bank account?

Message.deleteFailed: Failed to delete bank account, perhaps it is already in use.
Message.identifierRequired: Please provide your IBAN. If your company is in Sweden and you don't have one, then provide your bankgiro or plusgiro.

Confirmation.delete: Do you really want to delete this contact?
Confirmation.linkedToUser: Only the contact will be deleted. User will not be deleted.
Confirmation.createUser: Do you really want to create user?

Message.deleteFailed: Failed to delete contact, perhaps it is already in use.

Autocomplete.noResultsText: Nothing found. Please modify your search criteria.
